newsfeed.content: We will be presenting a paper: "Enhancing CyanoHAB Monitoring Across Multi-Satellite Sensors: Combining Empirical Phycocyanin Algorithms using Machine Learning"
newsfeed.conference: IEEE International Geoscience and Remote Sensing Symposium 2024

newsfeed.content: We will be presenting a poster: "Advancing Remote Sensing of CyanoHABs - Phycocyanin Estimation using Hyperspectral Inversion and Machine Learning"
newsfeed.conference: NASA's Biodiversity and Ecological Forecasting Annual Meeting 2024
